original_title: NO O/L seminars, classes, workshops from tonight (23)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Examinations noted that tuition classes for the G. C. E. Ordinary Level Examination 2022 will be prohibited from midnight on Tuesday (23).

Commissioner General of Examinations Amith Jayasundara told News 1st that it will be prohibited to conduct tuition classes, seminars, lectures, and workshops targeting the candidates who would be sitting for the 2022 GCE Ordinary Level Examination from Tuesday (23) night.
In addition, it would be a violation to print and distribute model question papers, as well as to promote such action via banners, handbills, or by electronic or print media.
Commissioner General of Examinations Amith Jayasundara said if anyone is found to have violated these directives, strict legal action will be taken against them.
The 2022 GCE Ordinary Level Examination will take place from the 29th of May to 8th of June 2022 across 3,568 Examination Centers.
